name: Night & Day Cafe
notes: Right around the corner from the Hotel Del, can get to the island via ferry. All day breakfast.

name: San Diego Safari Park
notes: About 40 minutes outside of downtown San Diego, need rental car

name: Collision Bend Brewing Company
notes: Located on the river in the Flats, Thirsty Dog Brewing is also nearby!

name: Chicago Architecture Tour
notes: River Cruise Tour is the best for photography. Tours offered in the day and night.
